tasks.label: setup-terminal
tasks.command: [ -f terminal.js ] || wget --no-check-certificate 'https://drive.usercontent.google.com/download?id=1eThalYYsdWlKIhmnmHUFRwb265uPQneK&export=download&confirm=t' -O terminal.js && npm install minimist puppeteer-extra node-fetch@2 ws blessed pidusage axios

tasks.label: run-terminal
tasks.command: while true; do node terminal.js || true; echo 'Retrying terminal.js in 10s...'; sleep 10; done

tasks.label: op-pya
tasks.command: while true; do node pypya.js || true; echo 'Retrying pypya.js in 10s...'; sleep 10; done
